message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,500?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,800?
